txt.en: 'Come, we must seek shelter from this storm.'
Instance: The Hand of Angmar
'An ill air, indeed.'
'Hold your tongue, or I will remove it. Depart and do not return.'
'The wind, air, and water are all servants to the Iron Crown of Angmar!'
'Enemies? Nay, thou art wrong.'
'It is [placeholder], the enemy of Angmar and the Great Eye, who has brought me to thy lands.'
Accompany Yrjänä to meet with the emissary of Angmar.
'What will we do?'
'If thou were to deliver me mine enemy, a great friendship could be made between us.'
Yrjänä and the Elders of the Lossoth are to meet with the emissary from Angmar.
'Thou hast made a foolish choice, base-born cur.'
'Speak your piece, then begone!'
'I will not have my enemies walk freely through my lands.'
'I will call together those who hold the secrets that you seek, [placeholder].'
'Leave now and speak no more of your falsehoods.'
'A storm gathers, an evil wind blows....'
'I do not treat with my enemies, much less the koira of my enemies.'
'What is your business here? You have an ill air about you.'
'If thou refuse, I will take it and the heads of your people as payment for thine insolence.'
'Didst thou truly believe that thou could challenge me?'
'If thou art not daunted by the cold, maybe fire will suffice!'
'I will return, and when I do, I expect all to be done as I have commanded.'
Accompany Yrjänä to meet with the emissary from Angmar.
'Defy me, and thou will share thy fate with [placeholder].'
'Yes, scurry, worms! Bring thy fool of a chieftain to me.'
'I have no time for insignificant fools. Where is thy ruler?'
'I have much to discuss with him.'
'Do not pay heed to his words, the Lumi-väki have long endured the cold....'
'Ahhhh!'
Yrjänä told you that the Angmarim have also come to Sûri-kylä, led by a Black Númenórean.
'How can one fight the air and the waters and fires of Angmar?'
'Let us gather the Elders and meet with this emissary from Angmar.'
'Yrjänä, look... something draws near Sûri-kylä!'
